ruleId.description: The unique identifier for the rule.

messageToUser.description: Assistant message to user like 'you are about to change the rule...'. the message must contain parameter values that are being changed

description.description: A detailed description of the rule.

duration.description: The duration in seconds for which the rule is applicable.

lowWater.description: A double value between 0 and 1 representing the low water threshold.

sensorId.description: The identifier of the sensor associated with the rule.

actorId.description: The identifier of the actor associated with the rule.
